IEEE Draft Guide and Tutorial for the Application of High-Voltage (&amp;#x003E; 1000 V) Fuses and Accessories

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Information for understanding the construction, operation, and application of high-voltage (&amp;#x003E; 1000 V) fuses and accessories, intended for use on alternating current (ac) electrical distribution systems is provided. Current-limiting, expulsion, electronic, and other non-current-limiting fuses and accessories are covered, as are North American, European, and other application practices.
